Text:
ya know....a description would be nice....maybe...something like this:

In his second book, Adam Carolla-author of New York Times bestseller In Fifty Years We''ll All Be Chicks and chart-topping podcaster-reveals all the stories behind how he came to be the angry middle-aged man he is today.

If you don't know what this is, then i doubt a description is going to make you download it.

And if you do know what this is, then a description won't make a difference.

But if you are really retarded and needy and need to read a dumb fucking description then you would be better off buying the book if you need to read things. So go here and buy the book instead.
http://www.amazon.com/Taco-Bell-Material-Adam-Carolla/dp/0307888878/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1340830908&sr=8-1&keywords=not+taco+bell+material

lol...nice reply Einstein.
no one is seeding anyways, so don't bother.

4 seeders = no seeders?

wow you're a smart one

Neipas09 is a  dumbass!

A description makes all the difference as to whether people download it.
Even people who may have heard the title before might have no idea what the storyline is.
There's a damn good reason why publishers print blurbs inside the covers: so shoppers will have some idea what the book is about before they buy it.
You know what.... Who gives a fuck about the description- Thanks for the upload. Cheers

Want us to shake your cock for you after you piss as well? If you want a description, look it up on Google or Amazon. The rest of us will be waiting here still not giving a fuck.

Thanks for the up.
